# Security Policy
## Supported Versions
| Version | Supported |
|----------|------------|
| main     | ✅         |
| dev      | ⚠️ testing |

## Reporting a Vulnerability
Please report security issues via [GitHub Security Advisories](https://github.com/Zaikon13/All-in-One-DeFi-Bot/security/advisories/new)
or privately to maintainer **@Zaikon13**.
